title: Zwyrds Homegrown Cuts - Misc Stuff
description:
Zwyrd&#039;s Homegrown Cuts - Misc Stuff

Here are my "Fan Mixes" of tracks/CDs by various Industrial/Noise/Avantgarde Bands/Projects plus a surprise.
Featured artist are Einstuerzende Neubauten, Pigface, Al Jourgensen (Revolting Cocks, Ministry, Lard, Khyber Alien), Pig, Nine Inch Nails and - Jasper van&#039;t Hof.

All files are in lossless FLAC format, although not all source samples are lossless.
These tracks are also available as 128k mp3s on my homepage: http://weird.gmxhome.de/PAGES/Sounds.htm

This mixing work is licensed under a Creative Commons-License. http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/2.0/en/


Jasper van&#039;t Hof - Pili pili (Moon dance Cut Edit) *** Containing elements from 1984 and 1985 versions of Jasper van&#039;t Hof track "Pili-Pili" as well as some loops from The Young Gods, Lard and JS (live); 2006; 12:28; 76,611,713B
Visit: http://www.jaspervanthof.com/
#*#*# All you Industrial/Noise freaks - check out the the original versions of this awesome track if you ever run into them!
